item.title: Updated dataset menu and dataset properties
item.description: Now dataset editors can access most dataset actions directly from the dataset menu. Additionally, weâ€™ve redesigned our dataset properties page. New dataset menu When you click the dataset name from within a dataset, you may notice some changes to the dropdown menu: Many of the actions that used to be accessed through Dataset properties can now be performed directly from this menu. Specifically Export dataset, Append, Join, Organize variables, Exclude cases, and (under Advanced), Create draft and View dataset history.
